패키지 로드
```{r}
library(tm)
library(cluster)
library(class)
library(SnowballC)
```
데이터 불러오기
```{r}
r3 <- read.csv("r3.csv", header = TRUE)
str(r3)
r3.cor <- Corpus(VectorSource(r3[,2]))
r3.cor
```
데이터전처리
```{r}
r3.clean <- tm_map(r3.cor, content_transformer(tolower)) #change to small letter
r3.clean <- tm_map(r3.clean, removeWords, stopwords("english"))
r3.clean <- tm_map(r3.clean, content_transformer(removePunctuation)) #remove punctuation like :,.!
r3.clean <- tm_map(r3.clean, content_transformer(removeNumbers)) #remove numbers
r3.clean <- tm_map(r3.clean, stripWhitespace)    #delete vacant space

r3.dtm <- DocumentTermMatrix(r3.clean)
r3.dtm
```
샘플
```{r}
r3.df <- as.data.frame(data.matrix(r3.dtm))
r3.df <- cbind(r3.df, r3[,3]) #분류 열 붙이기
colnames(r3.df)[ncol(r3.df)] <- "category" #분류 열 이름 "catergory"로 바꾸기
r3tr.m <- sample(nrow(r3.df), ceiling(nrow(r3.df)*.70)) #훈련데이터와 실험데이터 70:30으로 나누기
r3ts.m <- (1:nrow(r3.df))[- r3tr.m] #훈련데이터와 실험데이터 70:30으로 나누기
cl <- r3.df[,"category"] #"category" 분리
r3.model <- r3.df[,!colnames(r3.df)%in%"category"] #"category"를 제외한 모델 데이터 만들기
```
k-nn알고리즘
```{r}
knn1 <- knn(r3.model[r3tr.m,], r3.model[r3ts.m,], cl[r3tr.m], k=1)
r3ts.m <- cbind(r3ts.m,knn1)
knn2 <- knn(r3.model[r3tr.m,], r3.model[r3ts.m,], cl[r3tr.m], k=2)
r3ts.m <- cbind(r3ts.m,knn2)
knn3 <- knn(r3.model[r3tr.m,], r3.model[r3ts.m,], cl[r3tr.m], k=3)
r3ts.m <- cbind(r3ts.m,knn3)
knn4 <- knn(r3.model[r3tr.m,], r3.model[r3ts.m,], cl[r3tr.m], k=4)
r3ts.m <- cbind(r3ts.m,knn4)
knn5 <- knn(r3.model[r3tr.m,], r3.model[r3ts.m,], cl[r3tr.m], k=5)
r3ts.m <- cbind(r3ts.m,knn5)
r3ts.m
```
